Package Elections

Class Election

java.lang.Object
Elections.Election
Direct Known Subclasses:
ElectionIRV, ElectionOPL
public class Election extends Object
Represents an election with no specified type. Written by Jasper Rutherford

  • Constructor Details

    • Election

      public Election​(FileHandler fileHandler, boolean shuffle)
      Creates an election with the given inputs
      Parameters:
      fileHandler - how this election will get inputs from files/send outputs to files
      shuffle - whether or not this election should shuffle its ballots (only used if the election is IRV based)

  • Method Details

    • calcResults

      public boolean calcResults()
      Calculates the results of the election
      Returns:
      true if the election was ran successfully, false if there was an error

    • inputFileExists

      public boolean inputFileExists()
      gets whether or not the input file exists
      Returns:
      true if the input file exists, false otherwise

    • nextLine

      public String nextLine()
      gets the next line of information from the input file
      Returns:
      the next line of information from the input file

    • nextInt

      public int nextInt()
      gets the first integer on the next line in the input file. the rest of that line is then ignored.
      Returns:
      the first integer found on the next line in the input file

    • getWinners

      public ArrayList<Candidate> getWinners()
      gets the list of winners of this election
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Candidates which represent which candidates have won this election

    • generateReport

      public void generateReport()
      generates a report from the current state of the election
